Name: Suffering Disquiet
Phase158Description: Lorath has sent me to Orbei Monastery to speak with the Abbot. He may have more to share regarding why Elias would have come to the Dry Steppes.
Phase170Description: The innermost cloister of the monastery is locked behind a spelled door. It appears to be asking for a Litany laid down by the founders.
Phase170OutsideSubzoneHeader: Find the words of the secret Litany within the Orbei Monastery
Phase175Description: Reciting the Litany should unseal the doors to the Inner Cloister.
Phase175OutsideSubzoneHeader: Recite the Litany and remove the seal on the doors within the Orbei Monastery
Phase297Description: Orbei Monastery has gone cold. Whatever happened here must be uncovered. Answers, and the Abbot, will likely be found within these halls.
Phase297OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for the Abbot within the Orbei Monastery
Phase307OutsideSubzoneHeader: Slay the Eidolon of Orbei within the Orbei Monastery
Phase308OutsideSubzoneHeader: Slay the Eidolon of Orbei within the Orbei Monastery
Phase309OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with the Abbott within the Orbei Monastery
Phase310Description: The spirits of the monks of Orbei Monastery have gone mad and joined together into an entity of fear and hatred. I must defeat it and allow them to rest.
Phase310OutsideSubzoneHeader: Slay the Eidolon of Orbei within the Orbei Monastery
Phase414Description: Orbei Monastery has gone cold. Whatever happened here must be uncovered. Answers, and the Abbot, will likely be found within these halls.
Phase414OutsideSubzoneHeader: Search for the Abbot within the Orbei Monastery

Phase425OutsideSubzoneHeader: Pick up the Crusader Skull within the Orbei Monastery

Phase443OutsideSubzoneHeader: Slay the Eidolon of Orbei within the Orbei Monastery
Phase52Description: I cannot find anyone outside or within the upper levels of the Monastery. I must delve into the lower halls and see what has happened here.
Phase52OutsideSubzoneHeader: Enter the Orbei Monastery Halls and search for the Abbot
Toast: Discover the fate of the Orbei Monastery
